articleplaceholder-desc: Provides a special page with {{WBREPONAME}} information about a certain topic, with invitation to create an article for the topic
articleplaceholder-fancyunicorn-intro: This is the SpecialPage Fancy Unicorn of the ArticlePlaceholder extension. Much fancy, very unicorn. (so exciting)
articleplaceholder-fancyunicorn-entityid: Enter a entity ID to get a auto generated Article Placeholder.
articleplaceholder-fancyunicorn-no-entit: This is not a valid entity id.
articleplaceholder-fancyunicorn-create-a: Create a new article with the title
articleplaceholder-fancyunicorn-article-: An article with this name already exists
